description_for_human: Free, open-source, self-hosted affiliate marketing platform. Track referrals, manage commissions, automate payouts.
description_for_model: Refferq is a free, open-source, self-hosted affiliate marketing platform built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Prisma. It provides affiliate management, real-time tracking, flexible commission rules, automated payouts, 38+ REST API endpoints, 12 webhook event types, and deployment via Docker or Vercel. It is licensed under MIT and costs $0 for the self-hosted version.
